response.original_title: The World is a Ghetto - Quadio
response.overview: Available For The First Time In Nearly 50 Years  Transferred From The Original Half-Inch Four-Channel Masters  Blu-ray With 192/24 Resolution Quadraphonic And Hi-Res Stereo Mixes  Quadraphonic sound, or 4.0 surround sound, utilizes four audio channels connected to four speakers positioned at the corners of a listening space. The multi-tracked audio is mixed dimensional, immersing the listener in an expansive soundscape.  The 1973 Billboard Album of the Year, WAR’s THE WORLD IS A GHETTO, saw the group leaning towards a progressive soul and jazz sound. The record housed the gold-certified tracks “The Cisco Kid” and “The World Is A Ghetto.”
response.title: The World is a Ghetto - Quadio
